event.title: Talk 10: Real time
event.description:
Cancelled: Apologies for the short notice but I've just heard that unfortunately the developer advocate from pusher.com cannot make it tomorrow night. So we've decided to cancel the event and turn it into Christmas drinks ... hope you'll all join us.

We're going to be heading to Colston Yard for 7pm so hope to see you there.

Hopefully we'll be able to reschedule the 'Realtime' event for the new year.

Mobile is all about 'the moment' and doing things now, not later. With that in mind this talk night is geared around real time communication. 

We've lined up a speaker from Pusher.com who will also be covering the beer tab at the bar afterwards. :) 

Give us a shout if you'd like to show case/present an app you've worked on with real time communications and are open to speaking about your experiences (good and bad). I'm thinking mainly this would be from a dev focus, however if any UI/UX peoples have perspective of designing for real time that would be good too. 

As always please only RSVP yes if you can make it :)
